name: gnometouch
description: Enhances various aspects of the GNOME experience when using a touch device.
author: mityax

scripts.build:release: npm run lint && npm run build -- --release
scripts.enable: npm run build && gnome-extensions install -f ./dist/gnometouch@mityax.github.com.zip && gnome-extensions enable gnometouch@mityax.github.com && echo '✅ Successfully installed and enabled debug build.'
scripts.enable:release: npm run lint && npm run build:release && gnome-extensions install -f ./dist/gnometouch@mityax.github.com.zip && gnome-extensions enable gnometouch@mityax.github.com && echo '✅ Successfully installed and enabled release build.'
scripts.watch: npm run build -- --watch & pid="$!"; sleep 1s; dbus-run-session -- $(pwd)/run.sh --watch; pkill --signal SIGINT -P $pid
scripts.watch:verbose: npm run build -- --watch & pid="$!"; sleep 1s; dbus-run-session -- $(pwd)/run.sh --watch --verbose; pkill --signal SIGINT -P $pid
scripts.watch-tty: npm run build -- --watch & pid="$!"; sleep 1s; dbus-run-session -- $(pwd)/run.sh --watch --tty; pkill --signal SIGINT -P $pid
scripts.watch-tty:verbose: npm run build -- --watch & pid="$!"; sleep 1s; dbus-run-session -- $(pwd)/run.sh --watch --tty --verbose; pkill --signal SIGINT -P $pid
